interface.name: DigestMethod
interface.javadoc: The SHA1 digest method algorithm URI.
The SHA256 digest method algorithm URI.
The SHA512 digest method algorithm URI.
The RIPEMD-160 digest method algorithm URI.

Returns the algorithm-specific input parameters associated with this DigestMethod.

The returned parameters can be typecast to a {@link DigestMethodParameterSpec} object. the algorithm-specific parameters (may be null if not specified)
